subtitle: at first glance it may seem ordinary
enough a simple handbag symbol appearing
in the carving of an ancient
culture and yet take a step back and
realize that this symbol appears in
works from Mesopotamia to mesoamerica
Asia and Africa Europe and North America
even on islands in the middle of the
ocean what are these Handbags and why
are they depicted again and again in
cultures separated by Cent
and thousands of miles cultures which
never came in contact with each other
and in most cases were not even aware of
each other's
existence the question has puzzled
archaeologists for
Generations recently an answer has
emerged one which not only explains what
the handbags are and why they appear
across cultures but which changes
everything we thought we knew about
human history
